com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenTextChangeListener


  • public interface SpenTextChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for text settings events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CONTROL_STATE_NOT_CHANGED
      Text setting is not changed.
      static int CONTROL_STATE_SELECTED
      Text setting is selected.
      static int CONTROL_STATE_UNSELECTED
      Text setting is unselected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChanged(SpenSettingTextInfo info, int state)
      Called when a text setting is changed.
      void onFocusChanged(boolean gainFocus)
      Called when a focus is changed.
      void onMoreButtonDown(SpenObjectTextBox object)
      Called when a more button is downed.
      boolean onSelectionChanged(int selStart, int selEnd)
      Called when a selection is changed.

    • Field Detail

      • CONTROL_STATE_SELECTED

        static final int CONTROL_STATE_SELECTED
        Text setting is selected.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTROL_STATE_UNSELECTED

        static final int CONTROL_STATE_UNSELECTED
        Text setting is unselected.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTROL_STATE_NOT_CHANGED

        static final int CONTROL_STATE_NOT_CHANGED
        Text setting is not changed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onChanged

        void onChanged(SpenSettingTextInfo info,
             int state)
        Called when a text setting is changed.
        Parameters:
        info - The text setting information.
        state - The control state. The valid values are: CONTROL_STATE_NOT_CHANGED, CONTROL_STATE_SELECTED, CONTROL_STATE_UNSELECTED, For more information, see Field Detail in this interface reference.

      • onSelectionChanged

        boolean onSelectionChanged(int selStart,
                         int selEnd)
        Called when a selection is changed.
        Parameters:
        selStart - The selection starting index.
        selEnd - The selection ending index.
        Returns:
        true – if the listener consumes the event. false – if the listener does not consume the event.

      • onMoreButtonDown

        void onMoreButtonDown(SpenObjectTextBox object)
        Called when a more button is downed.
        Parameters:
        object - The text box object.

      • onFocusChanged

        void onFocusChanged(boolean gainFocus)
        Called when a focus is changed.
        Parameters:
        gainFocus - Set to true to gain the focus, set to false to not gain the focus.
